SEARCH
Package pl.polsl.lab.model

Class NumConversion

java.lang.Object
pl.polsl.lab.model.NumConversion
public class NumConversion extends Object
Identify the type of input number and converts to output notation (Arabic to Roman or vice versa). Arabic numerals range from 1 to 3999 since the overline in string cannot be detected from input or shown to the standard output.
Version:
1.2
Author:
Wing Cheung Chow

  • Method Details

    • isStringInteger

      public boolean isStringInteger(String input)
      Check whether the input string is an integer.
      Parameters:
      input - the string from command line arguments
      Returns:
      true if the string is an integer. false otherwise.

    • convertNum

      public void convertNum(String inputNum) throws InputOutputException
      Convert the input number based on the notation. If it is an integer within the desired range, convert it to Roman notation. If it is a string that matches with the rules of Roman numerals, convert it to Arabic notation. Input validation together with custom exception class for exception handling.
      Parameters:
      inputNum - the string from command line arguments
      Throws:
      InputOutputException - if the input parameter is outside the range of 1 to 3999 or does not match with the style of Roman notation.

    • arabicToRoman

      public void arabicToRoman(int inputNum) throws InputOutputException
      Convert the input integer to Roman numeral.
      Parameters:
      inputNum - the integer converted from input parameter
      Throws:
      InputOutputException - if the converted number does not match with the rules of Roman numerals

    • romanToArabic

      public void romanToArabic(String inputNum) throws InputOutputException
      Convert the input Roman numeral to Arabic numeral.
      Parameters:
      inputNum - the Roman numeral from input parameter
      Throws:
      InputOutputException - if the converted integer number does not lie in the range of 1 to 3999

    • addHistory

      public void addHistory(DataHistory data)
      Add the record to the list of conversion history when called by the controller.
      Parameters:
      data - the record to be added to the list of conversion history

    • clearHistory

      public void clearHistory()
      Clear the conversion history when called by the controller.

    • updateTableModel

      public Vector<Vector<String>> updateTableModel()
      Prepare the data for table model to be updated in GUI.
      Returns:
      vector of vector of string for JTable model
